REUTERS.UNKNOWN: A f2131 reute d f BC-CORRECTION---LONDON-- 03-25 0080
REUTERS.TEXT: CORRECTION - LONDON - CITIBANK LAUNCHES WARRANTS In London item "Citibank Launches Currency Warrants" please read second paragraph as follows "Each warrant, priced at 47.50 dlrs, gives the holder the right to purchase a nominal sum of 500 dlrs against marks at 1.8250 marks to the dollar or at 149.50 yen to the dollar between March 31, 1987 and March 31, 1989." (Corrects dollar/mark exchange rate to 1.8250 and makes clear that dollar purchase is against marks or yen.) Reuter
